subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Snowboarding
Freestyle Skiing
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee approved the inclusion of men’s and women’s slopestyle events in snowboarding and freestyle skiing for the 2014 Games in Sochi, Russia.
snippet: The International Olympic Committee approved the inclusion of men’s and women’s slopestyle events in snowboarding and freestyle skiing for the 2014 Games in Sochi, Russia.
